name: Imputed amounts for headcount of R&D personnel, by personnel function and sex: FY 2023
description: Imputed amounts for headcount of R&D personnel, by personnel function and sex: FY 2023

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_personnel_functions_all_r_d_personnel
variableMeasured.description: All Personnel Functions All R D Personnel

variableMeasured.name: field_all_personnel_functions_imputed_amount_as_of_total
variableMeasured.description: All Personnel Functions Imputed Amount As Of Total

variableMeasured.name: field_researchers_imputed_amount_as_of_total
variableMeasured.description: Researchers Imputed Amount As Of Total

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_technicians_all_r_d_personnel
variableMeasured.description: R D Technicians All R D Personnel

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_technicians_imputed_amount_as_of_total

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_support_staff_imputed_amount

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_support_staff_imputed_amount_as_of_total
variableMeasured.description: R D Support Staff Imputed Amount As Of Total

notes: This table includes only institutions reporting $1 million or more in total R&D expenditures in FY 2022. Institutions reporting less than $1 million in total R&D expenditures in FY 2022 completed a shorter version of the survey form in FY 2023 that did not include this question.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey, FY 2023.
